summary: This is an email chain from August 2020 regarding a draft response to a letter about unsealing materials in the Epstein case. It involves legal counsel discussing discovery and protective order matters, with the main correspondence being from defense attorney Jeff Pagliuca.

persons.name: Jeff Pagliuca
persons.context: Attorney from Haddon, Morgan and Foreman, P.C. who sent a conferral letter regarding discovery to counsel.

persons.context: Attorney cc'd on Jeff Pagliuca's email regarding discovery matters.

events.title: Discovery Conferral Letter Sent

events.title: Draft Response to Unsealing Letter

keyFacts: The document shows ongoing legal proceedings in August 2020 regarding discovery and protective orders in the Epstein case.
Jeff Pagliuca of Haddon, Morgan and Foreman, P.C. is actively involved as defense counsel.
The email chain includes multiple attorneys (Menninger, Everdell, Cohen, Simmons) working on legal strategy.
The correspondence involves discussions about unsealing materials, indicating continued litigation over public access to case documents.
The document contains standard legal confidentiality notices about privileged information.
